sentences.en: Alan fell asleep as soon as he put his head on the pillow.
sentences.cn: 艾伦头一挨枕头就睡着了。

sentences.en: Any head teacher who made errors like this would be chucked out.
sentences.cn: 哪个校长只要犯了这样的错误都会被开除。

sentences.en: David was asked to head up the technical team.
sentences.cn: 戴维被要求领导技术小组。

sentences.en: He carried on telling a joke, laughing his head off.
sentences.cn: 他继续讲笑话，自己笑得前仰后合。

sentences.en: He headed the ball across the face of the goal.
sentences.cn: 他一个头球，球从球门前横飞而过。

sentences.en: He hit her on the head, causing her too to spurt blood.
sentences.cn: 他击中了她的头部，她也开始流血。

sentences.en: He kissed the top of her head.
sentences.cn: 他吻了一下她的头顶。

sentences.en: He still has a full head of hair (= has all his hair, even though he is getting rather old ).
sentences.cn: 他依然满头浓发。

sentences.en: His head was swathed in bandages made from a torn sheet.
sentences.cn: 他的头上缠满了一层层用床单撕成的绷带。

sentences.en: His jaw was broken after he was hit on the head.
sentences.cn: 他的头部受重击之后下颌骨折了。

sentences.en: I just can't get my head around this idea.
sentences.cn: 这种观点我就是想不通。

sentences.en: I let the horse drop his head to crop the spring grass.
sentences.cn: 我让马低下头啃吃春天的青草。

sentences.en: I was shaking from head to toe.
sentences.cn: 我浑身发抖。

sentences.en: It’s about time we were heading home.
sentences.cn: 我们该回家了。

sentences.en: Jenny marched proudly at the head of the procession.
sentences.cn: 珍妮自豪地走在游行队伍的前列。

sentences.en: Just play it safe, cover your ass, keep your head down.
sentences.cn: 要谨慎行事，保护好自己并保持低调。

sentences.en: Leatherdale was hit resoundingly on the side of the head.
sentences.cn: 莱瑟戴尔头部一侧遭到响亮的一击。

sentences.en: Lie face upwards with a cushion under your head.
sentences.cn: 头枕垫子仰卧。

sentences.en: Mari tilted her head back so that she could look at him.
sentences.cn: 玛丽把头向后仰，以便能看到他。

sentences.en: She bowed her head in a gesture somehow reminiscent of royalty.
sentences.cn: 她低头的姿势让人想起皇室风范。

sentences.en: She lost her head and started screaming at me.
sentences.cn: 她惊慌失措，开始向我大声尖叫。

sentences.en: She was dressed in black from head to foot (= over all her body ).
sentences.cn: 她从头到脚穿了一身黑。

sentences.en: Somalia, pop. 7.9 million, income per head about £1.60 a week.
sentences.cn: 索马里，人口790万，人均收入大约每周1.60英镑。

sentences.en: such an idea never entered my head.
sentences.cn: 我从没想到过这个主意。

sentences.en: That song has stuck in my head for years.
sentences.cn: 那首歌多年来一直铭记在我心中。

sentences.en: the &I{Boy Andrew} went down by the head.
sentences.cn: “安德鲁男孩号"船头朝下沉没。

sentences.en: The Colonel bowed his head and whispered a prayer of thanksgiving.
sentences.cn: 这位上校低头轻声做感恩祈祷。

sentences.en: the violence came to a head with the deaths of six youths.
sentences.cn: 随着六名年轻人的死亡，暴力行为发展到了危急关头。

sentences.en: They dived head first into the water.
sentences.cn: 他们一头跳进水中。

sentences.en: Try to head him off before he gets home.
sentences.cn: 在他回到家之前截住他

sentences.en: Where are you guys headed?
sentences.cn: 你们要去哪儿？

（尤指阻止争吵时）严厉斥责争吵者

phrases.phrase: be banging (或 knocking) one's head against a brick
phrases.tran_cn: 硬做不可能成功的事；劳而无功
(英，非正式)使生气，使糊涂，使气恼

phrases.phrase: get one's head down Brit. informal 英，非正式
phrases.tran_cn: 聚精会神地做手头的工作
(非正式)搞明白；想通（不快或不幸之事）
拦截：阻挡…的进程或完成；拦截

领先；抢先起步的优势；有利的开端

trans.tran_cn: 头，心智，前端，顶部，校长，领导人，脓头，源头，叶球，泡沫，头数，磁头，硬币正面
trans.tran_en: the top part of your body that has your face at the front and is supported by your neck
the top part of your body that has your face at the front and is supported by your neck

trans.tran_cn: 排在前头，居…之首，掌管，朝着，标题为，用头顶球
trans.tran_en: to go or travel towards a particular place, especially in a deliberate way
to go or travel towards a particular place, especially in a deliberate way
